casebody.data:
TROPIC LEISURE CORP., et al.
v.
HAILEY 106P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 L. Lamar Armstrong, Jr., Attorney at Law, Smithfield, Daniel K. Keeney, Attorney at Law, for Hailey, Jerry A. *869R. Keith Shackleford, Attorney at Law, John Wait, Attorney, for Tropic Leisure Corp., et al. John-Russell Bart Pate, Attorney at Law, for Virgin Islands Bar Association

The following order has been entered on the conditional motion filed on the 7th of April 2017 by Virgin Islands Bar Association for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
